title: Wordpress & PHP Developer Required for Quiz
snippet:
Hi there,

I need assistance with the creation of a quiz.
To complete the task, I will need someone who can 
1)	Find appropriate Wordpress Quiz plugin.
2)	Create a quiz with this plugin
3)	Create an input form of the page with quiz results
4)	Add to a page with quiz results jQuery code, that will grab results and send it to the PHP script with Ajax.
5)	Create PHP script with FPDF, that will convert quiz results to PDF and send it to an email specified by the user (if possible is It possible to integrate with Active Campaign)
Skills & knowledge required: Wordpress, HTML, PHP, jQuery, Ajax, FPDF (important)

Thanks
